name: Bliss - The Game for Lovers
description:
Bliss, the Game for Lovers, is a romantic game for a couple in love to play in bed. Unlike many adult oriented computer games, Bliss emphasizes romance and intimacy rather than blatant sexuality.

Bliss uses advanced computer technology to adapt itself to your personal romantic preferences. Bliss keeps track of:
• your favorite background music
• your romantic preferences
• even what you are wearing
to give you and your lover a surprising new experience in lovemaking!

Bliss is played much like a board game. Each turn, you roll the dice and move around the board. When you arrive at a space on the board, you will be given an action to do. Bliss chooses an action for you based on the space you landed on, what you are wearing, how long you have been playing the game, what toys you have available, and other factors. As the game progresses so do the actions. Bliss is the world's first intelligent romantic game for lovers!

Bliss features:
• Over 700 built-in actions
• Additional actions available for purchase and for free
• If you own the desktop version of Bliss you can import your custom actions and profiles
• Add your own favorite mood music from your music library or enjoy the built-in songs
• A beautiful wood game board or use your own photo

If you would like to see what playing Bliss is like before committing to a purchase, search for "Bliss Lite - The Game for Lovers". Bliss Lite is a free version of Bliss with reduced features and options.

Bliss is based on the popular PC game available at gamesforloving.com. What people have said about Bliss:
